report.title: Squares released in period 2
report.description: List of squares that have been released between two dates. Report is very similar to Squares Taken On In Period and Deallocated Squares 2 report.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=square.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavEx on lavEx.location_id=square.id AND lavEx.location_attribute_id=#excluded_square_attr_id# AND lavEx.deleted=false --Are we interested in squares which are allocated and don't have data. Varies based on checkbox option provided by user. --If square is de-allocated it must have a deleted allocation JOIN person_attribute_values pavRemovedAlloc on pavRemovedAlloc.int_value=square.id AND pavRemovedAlloc.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pavRemovedAlloc.deleted=true AND (EXTRACT(epoch from age(pavRemovedAlloc.updated_on::DATE, pavRemovedAlloc.created_on::DATE)) / 86400)::int >= #min_time_between_create_and_delete# LEFT JOIN people p on p.id=pavRemovedAlloc.person_id AND p.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users u on u.person_id=p.id AND u.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users_websites accesscheck on accesscheck.website_id=lw.website_id AND accesscheck.user_id=#auth_user_id# AND accesscheck.site_role_id<3 WHERE (square.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id#) AND #website_filter# AND (lavEx.int_value != 1 OR lavEx.int_value IS NULL) AND square.deleted=false AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR CAST(COALESCE(pavRemovedAlloc.updated_on,'1500-01-01') as date) >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR CAST(COALESCE(pavRemovedAlloc.updated_on,'1500-01-01') as date) <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (#created_data_only#=0 OR (#created_data_only#=1 AND square.id in (SELECT distinct plot.parent_id FROM locations plot JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on csf.location_id = plot.id AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND csf.training = false WHERE plot.location_type_id in (#plot_location_type_ids#))))

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of NPMS surveys to take into account

param.name: plot_location_type_ids
param.description: Plot location types as comma separated list

param.name: user_square_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: excluded_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of attribute that holds whether a square is excluded or not. If it is excluded then don't display on the map.

param.name: created_data_only
param.display: Only include squares that have had data (samples) created for them

param.name: min_time_between_create_and_delete
param.description: Minimum time (in days) between when the square was allocated and deallocated, this allows squares which were allocated and deallocated immediately (e.g. due to a mistake) to be ignored.

column.name: first_name
column.sql: CASE WHEN u.id IS NULL OR p.id IS NULL THEN '' || p.first_name || '' ELSE p.first_name END

column.name: surname
column.sql: CASE WHEN u.id IS NULL OR p.id IS NULL THEN '' || p.surname || '' ELSE p.surname END

column.name: email
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE p.email_address END
